downloadDescription: The Deployment Overview Quick Reference provides a brief overview of the Business Productivity Online Standard Suite Deployment guide and methodology.
detailsSection:
Microsoft® makes it easy for your organization to migrate to the Business Productivity Online Standard Suite (BPOS-S). Our proven deployment methodology (with more than a million seats deployed), will help your organization plan, prepare, and migrate into the cloud. 

The Deployment Overview Quick Reference provides a brief overview of the Business Productivity Online Standard Suite Deployment guide and methodology.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
